title: PBE Settings screen is completly green
body: It's pretty much imposible to see not sure what is causing it just went into a game and there it was ...

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue on PBE. 

In the future, please report PBE related issue on the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe), as it helps us separate issues that are occurring on live as opposed to PBE. :]
